mapper.select:
SELECT A.CORNER_NM AS cornerNm , A.CORNER_CD AS cornerCd , A.DISP_NUM AS dispNum , B.CHANNEL_CD AS channelCd FROM MIND_INV_CORNER A, MIND_INV_CHANNEL B WHERE 1=1 AND A.CHANNEL_CD = B.CHANNEL_CD
AND A.CHANNEL_CD = #{channelCd} AND A.CHANNEL_CD != 'MOBI'
AND A.CHANNEL_CD = #{mobiChannelCd}
AND A.CHANNEL_CD != 'MOBI'

SELECT CORNER_CD AS cornerCd , CORNER_NM AS cornerNm , ifnull(CORNER_DESC, '') AS cornerDesc , DISP_NUM AS dispNum , DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(REG_DT, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS regDt , REG_ID AS regId , ifnull(DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(MODI_DT, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), '') AS modiDt , ifnull(MODI_ID, '') AS modiId FROM MIND_INV_CORNER WHERE 1=1
AND CHANNEL_CD = #{channelCd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MIND_INV_CORNER ( CHANNEL_CD, CORNER_CD, CORNER_NM, CORNER_DESC, DISP_NUM, REG_DT, REG_ID ) VALUES ( #{channelCd}, (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(CORNER_CD)+1, 1) FROM MIND_INV_CORNER AS_SUB WHERE CHANNEL_CD = #{channelCd}), #{cornerNm}, #{cornerDesc}, #{dispNum}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'), #{regId} )
mapper.select:
SELECT BANNER_SEQ AS bannerSeq , CHANNEL_CD AS channelCd , CORNER_CD AS cornerCd , BANNER_NM AS bannerNm , BANNER_IMG_URL AS bannerImgUrl , TARGET_LINK AS targetLink , START_DT AS startDt , END_DT AS endDt , DISP_ORDER AS dispOrder , USE_YN AS useYn , ALL_CLIENT_YN AS allClientYn , REG_ID AS regId , DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(REG_DT, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS regDt , MODI_ID AS modiId , DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(MODI_DT, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS modiDt , SUBJECT AS subject , COMMENT AS comment FROM MIND_INV_BANNER WHERE 1=1
AND BANNER_SEQ = #{bannerSeq}
SELECT CHANNEL_CD AS channelCd , CHANNEL_NM AS channelNm , CHANNEL_DESC AS channelDesc FROM MIND_INV_CHANNEL WHERE CHANNEL_CD = #{channelCd}

SELECT COUNT(*) pageCommonCount FROM (
SELECT CORNER_CD AS cornerCd , CHANNEL_CD AS channelCd , CORNER_NM AS cornerNm , CORNER_DESC AS cornerDesc , DISP_NUM AS dispNum , DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(REG_DT, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS regDt , REG_ID AS regId , DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(MODI_DT, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS modiDt , MODI_ID AS modiId FROM MIND_INV_CORNER WHERE 1=1
AND CORNER_CD LIKE CONCAT('%', #{cornerCd},'%')
AND CORNER_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{cornerNm},'%')
ORDER BY CHANNEL_CD, CORNER_CD DESC
) A
LIMIT #{firstIndex} , #{pageSize}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM MIND_INV_CORNER WHERE CORNER_CD = ${cornerCd} AND CHANNEL_CD = #{channelCd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MIND_INV_BANNER_CLIENT ( CHANNEL_CD, CORNER_CD, BANNER_SEQ, CLIENT_CD ) VALUES ( #{channelCd}, #{cornerCd}, #{bannerSeq}, #{clientCd} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE CHANNEL_CD = #{channelCd}, CORNER_CD = #{cornerCd}, BANNER_SEQ = #{bannerSeq}, CLIENT_CD = #{clientCd}
mapper.select:
SELECT A.BANNER_SEQ AS bannerSeq , B.CLIENT_CD AS clientCd , B.CLIENT_NM AS clientNm FROM MIND_INV_BANNER_CLIENT A RIGHT JOIN MIND_CLIENT B ON A.CLIENT_CD = B.CLIENT_CD
AND A.BANNER_SEQ = #{bannerSeq}
